organizationList.title: Your organizations

HomePage.noDevices: You don't have any organization on this device.
HomePage.howToAddDevices: Create a new organization or get invited into an existing one.

CreateOrganization.organizationNameCriteria: Letters, digits, underscores and hyphens only. No spaces. Limited to 32 characters.
CreateOrganization.useMyOwnServer: I have my own PARSEC server
CreateOrganization.loading: Just a moment, we're setting up your organization
CreateOrganization.organizationCreated: You can access your new organization

subtitle.nameYourOrg: Choose the name of your organization.
subtitle.personalDetails: State your name, your email and your device name.
subtitle.server: Choose the type of server you need.
subtitle.overview: Check that the information is correct.
subtitle.Waiting: Just a moment and we'll set up your organization.
subtitle.Done: You can now access your new organization.

errors.badTimestamp: The time of your machine differs from the server's. Please check your clock and make sure it is up-to-date (your machine's time is {clientTime}, server time is {serverTime}).
errors.offline: Could not contact the server. Make sure you're connected to the internet.
errors.alreadyExists: This organization name is not available, please choose another one.

CreateOrganization.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel the process?
CreateOrganization.cancelConfirmSubtitle: Information will not be saved, you will have to restart.

done.subtitle: You have saved the password recovery files.
done.label: Files already downloaded

notDone.label: Action required
notDone.subtitle: Parsec does not store your password.
notDone.subtitle2: These files allow you to restore your password on a device if you forget it.

subtitles.provideHostCode: Click the code below on the guest.
subtitles.getGuestCode: Click on the code that appears on the guest.
subtitles.getDeviceInfo: Waiting for you to fill the information on the guest.
subtitles.waitForGuest1: To create a new device, you need to have Parsec open on both devices. Use the invitation link on your second device to start the process.
subtitles.waitForGuest2: Please don't close this window during the process.

errors.startFailed: Failed to start the process. Please make sure that you are connected to the internet.
errors.invalidCodeSelected: You didn't select the correct code. Please restart the process.
errors.noneCodeSelected: If you didn't see the correct code, it could be a security concern. Please restart the process.

greet.linkCopiedToClipboard: The link has been copied to the clipboard.

Password.passwordInfo: Your password must be secure and you must remember it. We advise you to create several devices if possible and to share workspaces.
Password.passwordCriteria: Make sure it corresponds to a strong level: avoid repetitions, overly common words and sequences.

PasswordInputModal.enterPassword: Please enter the password for {org} to continue.

subtitles.newPassword: Recovery files let you create a new password in the event that you forget it on this device.
subtitles.twoFilesToKeep: You will then have to keep two separate files:
subtitles.keepFilesSeparate: Please make sure both files aren't stored in the same folder.
subtitles.fileExplanation: This file will allow you to choose your password using the secret key.
subtitles.keyExplanation: The secret key is a code which will allow you to choose a new password.

toasts.fileDownloadOk: The recovery file was successfully downloaded
toasts.keyDownloadOk: The secret key was successfully downloaded

start.first: In order to avoid any attack, you will have to be in direct contact with the host during the whole enrollment process.
start.second: The host will have to go to Users, then Pending invitation to start the process.
start.greeter: You will be welcomed into the organization by {greeter} <{greeterEmail}>.

finish.first: You can now log in to Parsec.
finish.second: We advise that you create a recovery file in the event that you forget your password.

revocation.revokeTitle: Revoke this user? | Revoke these users?

revocation.revokeSomeFailed: Some users could not be revoked.
